channel.title: theBalancedBriefNLtech
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from theBalancedBriefNLtech, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Meta fixes bug that could leak users’ AI prompts and generated content
item.description: The tech giant fixed the security flaw, netting a security researcher $10,000 for privately disclosing the bug.

item.title: A former OpenAI engineer describes what it’s really like to work there
item.description: A senior engineer describes the thrill, chaos, and exhaustion of working at OpenAI this past year while launching its coding agent Codex.

item.title: 6 Best Android Tablets (2025), Tested and Reviewed
item.description: Forget the iPad. Catch up on your favorite shows in bed with one of these Android-powered slates.

item.title: AV startup Pronto.ai acquires off-road autonomous vehicle rival SafeAI
item.description: Pronto.ai CEO Anthony Levandowski said the move is meant to help bolster his company's ranks with like-minded talent and complementary technology.

item.title: Tech Billionaires Back Erebor in the Wake of Silicon Valley Bank Collapse
item.description: Funded by Anduril cofounder Palmer Luckey and Palantir cofounder Joe Lonsdale, the new bank—named, like their companies, after Tolkien lore—aims to se...

item.title: Mira Murati’s Thinking Machines Lab is worth $12B in seed round
item.description: The deal marks one of the largest seed rounds — or first funding rounds — in Silicon Valley history, representing the massive investor appetite to bac...

item.title: Best Yoga Mat (2025), Tested and Reviewed
item.description: Searching for the best yoga mat to help deepen your flow, master tree pose, and discover the meaning of life? For two of the three, we’ve got you cove...

item.title: The FBI's Jeffrey Epstein Prison Video Had Nearly 3 Minutes Cut Out
item.description: Metadata from the “raw” Epstein prison video shows approximately 2 minutes and 53 seconds were removed from one of two stitched-together clips. The cu...

item.title: The 54 Best Shows on Disney+ Right Now (July 2025)
item.description: Ironheart, Doctor Who, and Star Wars: Tales of the Underworld are just a few of the shows you should be watching on Disney+ this month.

item.title: Google Discover adds AI summaries, threatening publishers with further traffic declines
